actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code to provide certain National Service Life Insurance policyholders an opportunity to double their National Life Insurance coverage.

summary.text: Provides any person holding a National Service Life Insurance policy, except a service disabled veteran's policy, the opportunity to double his National Service Life Insurance Coverage, at premium rates which fully cover the Government's cost in providing such additional insurance.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code to provide certain National Service Life Insurance policyholders an opportunity to double their National Life Insurance coverage.
